name: Mal-K the crying lonely stone
description:
Once upon a time, there was a son from a poor family named Malin Kundang. He wanted to become a musician. So he went and traveled the world, seek for experience.

He succeeded and went back home, already a famous musician goes by the name Mal-K. Then he married a gorgeous woman from a noble family, and around that time an old woman came and greet him. He realized she was his mother, but instead of happiness he felt ashamed of her. Didn't want his wife to find out, he threw his mother out of his sight.

Her mother was so angry, she prayed to God to give punishment for her son. And not long after, during his concert, suddenly Malin couldn't move. His body became stiff and slowly turned into stone. Had no other choice after the incident, his wife divorced him. Now, he is known as Mal-K the crying lonely stone.
